known_issues: Live deployment failed due to deployment error; user requested retry to make it live.

existing_features.title: Identify the root cause of the previous live deployment failure (“Deployment error”) by reproducing the production deployment locally (or in the CI/deploy environment) and capturing the exact failing step and error output, then apply the minimal code/config changes needed so the same deployment completes successfully.

After the deployment succeeds, perform a post-deploy smoke test of the live site to confirm it is accessible and functional (homepage loads, header/footer render, and the Contact section external links are present).

projectName: Fix deployment error and successfully deploy the app live
